options.content:
**Dashboard Purpose**: Analyze support request patterns for automation opportunity identification and complexity assessment.

**Support Categories** (1,849 total):
- **Access/Permission Requests**: 908 tickets ($253K/year) - High automation potential
- **Email/Mailbox Issues**: 526 tickets ($147K/year) - Medium complexity
- **Password Reset Requests**: 196 tickets ($55K/year) - Low complexity, quick win
- **Software Installation**: 125 tickets ($35K/year) - Medium complexity
- **License/Activation**: 94 tickets ($26K/year) - Medium automation potential

**Use Cases**: Support automation scoping, self-service portal design, workflow automation planning, complexity assessment

panels.title: Email/Mailbox Issues (Top Support Pattern)
panels.description: Email configuration, access, and troubleshooting - 526 tickets

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC('week', "TKT-Created Time") as time,
  COUNT(*) as "Email Issues"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Team" IN (\'${team:raw}\') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND ("TKT-Title" ILIKE '%email%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%mailbox%')
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Access/Permission Requests
panels.description: Software access and permission management - 908 tickets

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC('week', "TKT-Created Time") as time,
  COUNT(*) as "Access Requests"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Team" IN (\'${team:raw}\') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND ("TKT-Title" ILIKE '%access%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%permission%')
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Password Reset/Unlock Requests
panels.description: Password resets and account unlock requests - 196 tickets

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC('week', "TKT-Created Time") as time,
  COUNT(*) as "Password Resets"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Team" IN (\'${team:raw}\') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND ("TKT-Title" ILIKE '%password%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%unlock%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%reset%')
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: License/Subscription Management
panels.description: Software license assignment and tracking - 94 tickets

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC('week', "TKT-Created Time") as time,
  COUNT(*) as "License Requests"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Team" IN (\'${team:raw}\') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND ("TKT-Title" ILIKE '%license%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%subscription%')
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC('week', "TKT-Created Time") as time,
  COUNT(*) as "Install Requests"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Team" IN (\'${team:raw}\') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND ("TKT-Title" ILIKE '%install%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%software%')
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Support Pattern Distribution
panels.description: Pie chart showing support category breakdown by volume. Prioritize largest slices for automation.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%access%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%permission%' THEN 'Access/Permissions'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%email%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%mailbox%' THEN 'Email Issues'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%password%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%unlock%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%reset%' THEN 'Password Reset'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%install%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%software%' THEN 'Software Install'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%license%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%subscription%' THEN 'License Management'
    ELSE 'Other Support'
  END as "Pattern",
  COUNT(*) as "Count"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Team" IN (\'${team:raw}\') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND "TKT-Category" = 'Support Tickets'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

panels.title: Pattern Growth/Decline (Week-over-Week)
panels.description: Trend analysis showing which patterns are increasing or decreasing

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  DATE_TRUNC('week', "TKT-Created Time") as time,
  SUM(CASE WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%email%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%mailbox%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Email",
  SUM(CASE WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%access%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%permission%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Access",
  SUM(CASE WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%password%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%unlock%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%reset%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Password",
  SUM(CASE WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%license%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%subscription%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "License",
  SUM(CASE WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%install%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%software%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Install"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Team" IN (\'${team:raw}\') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND "TKT-Category" = 'Support Tickets'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Pattern Details with Automation Recommendations
panels.description: Detailed breakdown with automation complexity and ROI estimates

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%access%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%permission%' THEN 'Access/Permissions'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%email%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%mailbox%' THEN 'Email Issues'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%password%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%unlock%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%reset%' THEN 'Password Reset'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%install%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%software%' THEN 'Software Install'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%license%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%subscription%' THEN 'License Management'
  END as "Pattern",
  COUNT(*) as "Ticket Count",
  ROUND(COUNT(*) * 1.0 / 104 * 365, 0) as "Annual Projection",
  CASE 
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%password%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%unlock%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%reset%' THEN 'Self-Service Portal'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%access%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%permission%' THEN 'Workflow Automation'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%email%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%mailbox%' THEN 'Email Auto-Triage'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%license%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%subscription%' THEN 'License Management Portal'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%install%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%software%' THEN 'Package Manager Integration'
  END as "Automation Approach",
  CASE 
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%password%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%unlock%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%reset%' THEN 'Low'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%access%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%permission%' THEN 'Medium'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%email%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%mailbox%' THEN 'High'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%license%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%subscription%' THEN 'Low'
    WHEN "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%install%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%software%' THEN 'Medium'
  END as "Complexity",
  '$' || ROUND(COUNT(*) * 1.0 / 104 * 365 * 1.5 * 80 / 1000, 0) || 'K' as "Est. Annual Savings"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Team" IN (\'${team:raw}\') AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01' AND "TKT-Created Time" <= '2025-10-13'
AND (
  ("TKT-Title" ILIKE '%access%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%permission%') OR
  ("TKT-Title" ILIKE '%email%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%mailbox%') OR
  ("TKT-Title" ILIKE '%password%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%unlock%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%reset%') OR
  ("TKT-Title" ILIKE '%install%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%software%') OR
  ("TKT-Title" ILIKE '%license%' OR "TKT-Title" ILIKE '%subscription%')
)
GROUP BY 1, 4, 5
ORDER BY 2 DESC;
